details.title: Comments on `SCR 584 radar and Mk.56 gunfire control' by I. Getting
details.abstract: Some errors in the above-titled article (see ibid., vol.5, no.10, p.3-15, Oct. 1990) are pointed out. Although the material is peripheral to the principal subject, the commenter feels that they are significant to the article if taken as historical
details.journal_title: IEEE Aerospace and Electronic Systems Magazine
